infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses your camera to take photos for custom vocabulary cards that help your child learn new words.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library so you can choose pictures for custom vocabulary cards.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record your voice saying words, so your child can hear you speak each vocabulary word.

plugins.photosPermission: This app accesses your photo library so you can choose pictures for custom vocabulary cards.
plugins.cameraPermission: This app uses your camera to take photos for custom vocabulary cards that help your child learn new words.

plugins.microphonePermission: This app uses the microphone to record your voice saying words, so your child can hear you speak each vocabulary word.
